N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 21.13 - Leave for civil defense duties

State Regulations

Upon certification by the State Director of Civil Defense
of the necessity for the participation in State or local civil defense drills
of an employee enrolled as a civil defense volunteer and required to perform
civil defense duties pursuant to the New York State Defense Emergency Act, the
appointing authority may allow such employee to absent himself from his
position, without loss of pay or charge against leave credits, for such time as
is necessary for participation in such drills, but not exceeding cumulatively
five work days per calendar year. Notes
